movie.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology.

movie2.description: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.

movie3.movieTitle: Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movie3.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
